title: I'm building a site to list every drop box in the country
selftext:
[ballotdrop.org](https://ballotdrop.org)

The goal is to list every ballot drop box in the country, as well as other places to drop off a ballot without having to wait in line, worry about USPS deadlines, etc. In addition, we're adding as much information about voting in each state and county as we can!

​

It's a work in progress, and we need help gathering data, but it's already useful. Check out some examples:

[https://ballotdrop.org/Colorado/Denver-County](https://ballotdrop.org/Colorado/Denver-County)

[https://ballotdrop.org/North-Carolina/Mecklenburg-County](https://ballotdrop.org/North-Carolina/Mecklenburg-County)

​

Feedback, data collection and tech assistance, and most of all help spreading the word are all greatly appreciated!
